test-case.name: quantExpr-60
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "every" keyword and use of multiple variables and the xs:date data type.

test-case.name: quantexpr-61
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "some" keyword that binds the declared variables to and xs:integer type.

test-case.name: quantexpr-62
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "some" keyword that binds the declared variable to an xs:string type.

test-case.name: quantexpr-63
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "every" keyword that binds the declared variable to an xs:string type.

test-case.name: quantexpr-64
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "every" keyword that binds the declared variables to an xs:string and xs:integer type respectively.

test-case.name: quantexpr-65
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Simple quantified expression using "some" keyword that binds the declared variable to an xs:integer and xs:float type respectively.
